title: #145: Wednesday Martin - Sex, Female Infidelity, Monogamy, Why People Cheat, Desire, & Removing Sexual Misconceptions
itunes:title: #145: Wednesday Martin - Sex, Female Infidelity, Monogamy, Why People Cheat, Desire, & Removing Sexual Misconceptions
description:
On this episode we sit down with Wendy "Wednesday" Martin and talk all things sex. Wednesday is an author and cultural critic who writes and talks about parenting, step parenting, female sexuality, motherhood and pop culture. This episode is heavily focused on the topic of sex, female infidelity, monogamy, the need to feel desired, and why people cheat. We also talk about how the conversation around sex is still taboo and what we can do to change that.
